CustomField.description:
The Finish Variance field contains the amount of time that represents the difference between a baseline finish date of the project and its currently scheduled finish date.
Finish Variance = Finish Date - Baseline Finish Date
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Finish Variance = Finish Date - Baseline Finish Date
The Finish Variance field contains the amount of time that represents the difference between a baseline finish date of the project and its currently scheduled finish date.
CustomField.label: Finish Variance
